example: We need to find an alternative solution to this problem.
Water is scarce in this desert region.
Many houses now use solar panels for energy.
High sales figures spur the company to produce more goods.
We discussed the political situation in class.
He claims to have seen a UFO.
This book is essentially a guide to healthy living.
The ancient Greek philosopher Aristotle had many great ideas.

chinese: 感觉；感官〔即视觉、听觉、触觉、味觉和嗅觉〕
example: Dogs have a very good sense of smell.
We hold an annual meeting to discuss our plans.
The old building might collapse if not repaired.
Prior to the meeting, please submit your report.
We need to sustain our efforts to protect the environment.
The company closed the unprofitable branch.
A large vessel sailed into the harbor.
The fishing vessel returned with a big catch.
The biologist studies the behavior of animals.
The reproductive system of a plant is complex.
His rage was evident when he heard the news.
This new fashion is all the rage this season.
The country defends its territory fiercely.
I like to read books of the science fiction genre.
We listened to jazz music at the club.
These books fall into the history category.
You need to understand the context to get the meaning.
Oxygen is an important element for life.
She enjoys reading science fiction novels.
The weather gradually became warmer.
This painting has a unique style.
We classify the books by their authors.
All products must conform to safety standards.
The two companies plan to fuse their resources.
A hybrid car uses both gas and electricity.
It's a social norm to greet people politely.
The pioneer explored the unknown land.
Mozart is a famous classical composer.
Her performance was exceptional.
To some extent, his idea is correct.
The refinement of the process took months.
The clock has a complex mechanism.
The new law is restrictive in some ways.
There is a rivalry between the two sports teams.
The professor gave a detailed critique of the paper.
The news will appall many people.
His insightful comments helped solve the problem.
Her interpretation of the song was beautiful.
The painting shows the likeness of the king.
From my perspective, this plan will work.
The term remains undefined in the document.

chinese: v. 详尽阐述；adj. 精心制作的
example: v. Please elaborate on your idea. ; adj. The elaborate design impressed everyone.
Our schedule is flexible this week.
Flour is a key ingredient in bread.

chinese: n. 污迹, 污点；v. 染色
example: n. There is a stain on the shirt. ; v. She will stain the wood to match the furniture.
